short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The New Tab That Gives Back

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser’s new tab page into a powerful productivity hub while helping provide clean water to those in need. With Elliot for Water, you can customise your browser with productivity tools and widgets and help communities worldwide gain access to safe drinking water.

Features:
● Impact Tracking: Track your personal impact on water donations and see the entire Elliot for Water community’s contribution. Easily share your impact across social media to inspire others.
● To-Do List: Stay organized! Add, edit, and complete tasks with the option to see the entire list or focus on one task at a time.
● Most Visited Links: Quick access to your frequently visited websites, with two affiliate links that support water initiatives.
● Customizable Links: Personalize your list of go-to websites and organize them for easy access.
● Boost Your Impact: Increase your contribution by watching ad videos or viewing banner ads—100% optional, but every ad helps fund water projects.
● Focus of the Day: Set and display your daily focus to stay on track with your goals.
● Beautiful backgrounds: Enjoy a beautiful and inspiring background!
● Search Engine Selection: Choose from multiple search engines, including Bing,
Google, DuckDuckGo, and Ecosia.
● Time & Weather: Stay updated with the current time and local weather, right on your
new tab.
● Inspiring Quotes: Get a daily dose of inspiration and share uplifting quotes with friends
across social media.
● Donate Button: Want to do more? Use the dedicated donate button to support clean
water projects directly.

Why Elliot for Water?
By simply browsing the web, you can help bring clean drinking water to underserved communities. 20% of our revenue goes directly toward funding sustainable water projects worldwide. Download Elliot for Water and make a global impact with just one click. It’s productivity with a purpose!
